聞知る: (ききしる) - to learn something through hearing

聳り立つ: (そそりたつ) - to rise (steeply); to tower; to soar

聴き入る: (ききいる) - to listen attentively to; to be lost in
聴き取る: (ききとる) - to catch (a person's words); to make out; to follow; to understand
聴き頂く: (ききいただく) - to receive a hearing
聴く: (きく) - to hear; (usu. 聴く) to listen (e.g. to music); (formal 聴く) to ask/to enquire/to query; to learn of/to hear about; to follow (advice)/to comply with; (聞く, 聴く only)  to smell (esp. incense)/to sample fragrance
聴こえる: (きこえる) - to be heard/to be audible; to be said to be/to be reputed
聴し色: (ゆるしいろ) - permitted colour (for courtiers' clothing)
聴す: (ゆるす) - to permit/to allow/to approve/to tolerate; to exempt (from fine)/to excuse (from)/to pardon/to forgive/to release/to let off; to confide in; to give up/to yield
聴入る: (ききいる) - to listen attentively to; to be lost in
聴力計: (ちょうりょくけい) - audiometer; sonometer
聴取る: (ききとる) - to catch (a person's words); to make out; to follow; to understand
